title: Slab serif (Barton Parreira woodmark)
content:
I would like some help to identify BARTON PARREIRA woodmark, something like FF Signa Slab Extended... Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806010140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BP_3703.gif)
author: Ryuk

comments.content: I am seeing a touch of [Melior](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806010140/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/melior/)
Thanks a lot for this input Seb. It looks more modern than Melior to me. The counters are very specific. Probably custom... May be some similars will be suggested. Thanks.

Absolutely pretty. Something like Kontrapunkt meets Freight Micro plus …  
Please identify this one! Or if this is custom, think of a retail version of it.
